value.0: *The suspicious individual looks you over, then huffs* Yes?

Outside of the ones I can teach you, I've heard there's a Goblin who lives near the Dale's roads who is a shifter. As well as this, there's a Fey secluded in Amia Forest who may teach you a form if you help her. To get to her, go to the crossroads north of the Dale in Amia Forest, follow the path west for a while past a ruined tower. From here, there's a gate in a cliff. Just go through here and follow the bridge... the rest is easy to do from there on out.

I'm Jacob. That's all you really need to know... but I am what most folk called a Shifter. If you ever find yourself in the art or know friends who are, send them my way, I might be able to teach them a thing or two.
Hm... you seem to be trained in the art of Shifting, let's see what forms you might be able to take.
I can teach you one new form a day. I can teach Metallic, Chromatic and Planar Dragon forms.
Which would you like to learn? Note I can't teach you the same form twice.
Very well... listen carefully and reflect on what you see...
Don't waste my time, you already have this form.

*Jacob sighs at you* Listen, I've taught you one form today, come back later and I'll teach you some more all right? I'm tired.
I've heard there's some other forms out there I might be able to learn from others, do you know where I can find them?
Thank you.
Who are you?
I was wondering if you had any forms to teach me?
Maybe I should learn some more forms and see what I can learn in the future.
I've learned the Gargantuan Shape, what else can I learn?
Can I learn a Planar form?
Shadow Dragon Shape
Can I learn a Chromatic form?
Green Dragon Shape
Red Dragon Shape
Blue Dragon Shape
White Dragon Shape
Black Dragon Shape
Can I learn a Metallic form?
Copper Dragon Shape
Brass Dragon Shape
Bronze Dragon Shape
Silver Dragon Shape
Gold Dragon Shape
